detectors.description:

	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#42)

detectors.description:
RegularToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#50-58) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] >= _value && balances[_to] + _value >= balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#52)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#53)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#54)
detectors.markdown:
[RegularToken.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#L50-L58) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:

detectors.description:
RegularToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#60-68) may have integer overflow

	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#62)
	- balances[_from] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#63)
	- allowed[_from][msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#64)

detectors.description: Parameter RegularToken.balanceOf(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#70) is not in mixedCase

	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forsage__2.sol#24)
